None.Name: Void Surge
None.Description: Creates an explosion that deals the current void power + an additional 250% of it as damage to enemies in a 25m radius, up to 25% of this damage is applied per target. Void power is not used up. Knocks back small and medium units. Reusable every 30 seconds.
